verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> The fool <S%H5036><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> There is no <S%H369><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> They are corrupt, <S%H7843><s%> they have done abominable <S%H8581><s%> works, <S%H5949><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> looked down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8064><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> if there were <S%H3426><s%> any that did understand, <S%H7919><s%> and seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H853><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

They are all <S%H3605><s%> gone aside, <S%H5493><s%> they are all together <S%H3162><s%> become filthy: <S%H444><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> no, <S%H369><s%> not <S%H1571><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

Have all <S%H3605><s%> the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> knowledge? <S%H3045><s%> who eat up <S%H398><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> as they eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and call <S%H7121><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> upon the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> were they in great fear: <S%H6342><s%> <S%H6343><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is in the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
Ye have shamed <S%H954><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the poor, <S%H6041><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is his refuge. <S%H4268><s%>

Oh that <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were come out of Zion! <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6726><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bringeth back <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of his people, <S%H5971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
